data.title: Special Talents
data.text:
Special Talents (also called Star Talents) can be obtained from Special Talent Books. Some come from drops, some from Quests, some from Secrets, and some from each world's Taskboard Merit Shop. When you use a Special Talent book to learn a talent, that talent is learned for all characters on your account.

Certain Special Talent books have variable max levels. If you get a new book with a higher max level than your current max, you can use that new book to increase your max level. If the book's max level is lower or the same, you will not be able to use it.

To see where to acquire special talents, see Special Talent Book Sources.

Special Talents can only be reset using a Star Talent Reset Potion.

Special Talents Page 1

Special Talents Page 2

Special Talents Page 3

Special Talents Page 4

(-25 sides on the dice per LV) A drop from any mob, ore or tree in Blunder Hills, as well as the Boss. 100 Attacks on Simmer Attack moves boost your AFK gains more than they normally do (+0.35% attack AFK effect) A drop from any mob, ore or tree in Blunder Hills, as well as the Boss. 50 Toilet Paper Postage Stamps giving Skill Efficiency will give slightly higher bonuses Type "More like Poopy Pete" while standing next to TP Pete 120 EXP Converter Percentage EXP earned in chosen Skill is turned into Class EXP. Assign to Attack to choose.

(+.75% Exp Converted per LV: .03% deterioration per level)
